suppress.notes: It's a false positive - spring-security version is 5.3.x (see: https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258)

These CVE's are coming from Dhowden tag library and it impacts only MP3/MP4/OGG/FLAC metadata parsing library. Also it is declared as false positive in https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/3043
Declared as False Positive on com.nimbusds:oauth2-oidc-sdk #2866 https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/2866
